completeListOfAbilities.name: Quick Dualcast
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
3-hit group  PK magic  PG attack + group  PF attack delivered 3 times
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Target: 4 turns  PK Resist Down from first  PF attack
Self: Grants special effect Earth Crystal's Light (grants party BRV each turn [including enemy turns; max 5 turns] based on cumulative HP damage dealt with Quick Dualcast)

ailments.name: Earth Crystal's Light (Fixed)
ailments.desc: Earth Crystal's Light (Fixed)

ailments.name: PK Resist Down
ailments.desc: PK Resist Down: Lowers PK resist (does not stack)
